definition: to break/to destroy/to devastate/to ravage/to repress
to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus

sentences.english: Fett's armor and body were extremely battered by his ordeal in the Sarlacc.
sentences.chinese: 在沙拉克中的煎熬使费特的盔甲和身躯都饱受摧残。

sentences.english: The human's body and heart were heavily vandalized under such environment.
sentences.chinese: 在这样的环境下人的身心受着极大的摧残。

sentences.english: This is my end of morning reading , but is also my beginning of college life…
sentences.chinese: 这两年，被早读摧残的日子终于结束了。

sentences.english: The bleak breeze blights the brightly blooming blossom.
sentences.chinese: 阴冷的风摧残着灿烂的正在盛开的花朵。

sentences.english: You believe buying Apple undermines your individuality.
sentences.chinese: 你相信购买苹果摧残你的个性。

sentences.english: Europe was wracked by religious wars for several hundred years.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲就饱受宗教战争的摧残。

sentences.english: Hardest-hit were the provinces of Pakistan-Administered Kashmir and the North West Frontier.
sentences.chinese: 受地震摧残最严重的是巴控克什米尔和西北部省份。

sentences.english: Liberal arts after divide into classes, three girl friends to continue by science in class five.
sentences.chinese: 文理分班后，三闺蜜继续在五班受着理科的摧残。

sentences.english: If education rejects morals, it can also become a social danger.
sentences.chinese: 教育背离了道德，就会变成摧残人性的社会公害。

sentences.english: Don't play around with food or make faces in your potato mash.
sentences.chinese: 不要摧残华侈辚轹食品与将土豆泥涂在自己的脸上。

sentences.english: More faithful love, or is still real destruction.
sentences.chinese: 再坚贞的爱情，还是抵不过现实的摧残。

sentences.english: Man's anger, blows woman's pit of the stomach, can devastate the towering big tree.
sentences.chinese: 男人的怒气，吹进女人的心坎，会摧残参天大树。

sentences.english: Of all the tyrannies on human kind , the worst is that which persecutes the mind.
sentences.chinese: 摧残思想，这是所有专制中最黑暗的专制。

sentences.english: Prostitution is a profession that devastates the lives of young women.
sentences.chinese: 职业是对女孩子极度的摧残。

sentences.english: Here bad people hold sway while good people suffer and justice is trodden down underfoot.
sentences.chinese: 在这里坏人得志，好人受苦，正义受到摧残。

sentences.english: Where is the flying catkins, ice snow layer destruction.
sentences.chinese: 飞絮飞花何处是，层冰积雪摧残。

definition: to ravage/to devastate/to trample on/to violate
see 百孔千瘡|百孔千疮[bai3 kong3 qian1 chuang1]
to endure/to suffer/to be subjected to
